patterns: Hi
Hello
Hey
Hi there
Hello there
responses: Hello,ask your queries!
Hi,How can I help you?
Hey!
Hi there!
Hello there!

patterns: I cannot understand
I don't understand
What do you mean?
Can you repeat that?
I'm not sure I understand
responses: I apologize, could you please rephrase that?
I'm sorry, I didn't quite catch that. Could you repeat?
Could you provide more context?
I'm having trouble understanding. Could you try again?
Sorry, I couldn't understand. Can you please clarify?

patterns: Thank you
Thanks
Appreciate it
Thanks a lot
Thank you very much
responses: You're welcome!
You're welcome :)
Glad I could help!
No problem!
Anytime!

patterns: Goodbye
Bye
See you later
Take care
responses: Goodbye!
Bye!
See you later!
Take care!
